title: Pre-warning for floods issued
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Hydrology and Disaster Management Division of the Irrigation Department has issued a flood warning for areas in Sabaragamuwa, Western, Central and North Western Provinces.
The warning has been issued in view of the Meteorology Department’s forecast of rains over 150mm taking place during the upcoming days.
